STATE OF MICHIGAN
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
GRETCHEN WHITMER
LANS ING
ELIZABETH HERTEL
GOVERNOR DIRECTOR
June 23, 2023
Tracey Silas
KENT COUNTY DHHS
121 MARTIN LUTHER KING JR ST SE,
GRAND RAPIDS, MI, 49507-1132
RE: License#: CP410201222
Dear Ms. Silas:
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed
on June 22, 2023. Due to the violations of applicable licensing rules, a written corrective
action plan is required. The corrective action plan is due 15 days from the date of this
letter and must include the following:
• For any repeat violations, why the prior corrective action plan did not result
in compliance.
• How compliance with each citation will be achieved.
• Who is directly responsible for implementing the action steps in the
corrective action plan.
• Specific time frames for each citation as to when the correction will be
completed or implemented.
• How continuing compliance will be maintained once compliance is
achieved.
• The signature of the responsible party and a date.
If you fail to submit an acceptable corrective action plan, disciplinary action may result.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager, Jessica VandenHeuvel, at (616) 204-
6992.
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov • (517) 335-1980

Sincerely,
Melinda Gubbins, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
701 S. Elmwood, Ste. 11
Traverse City, MI 49684
(231) 342-3721
enclosure

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules except for
the following:
CPA Rule 400.12327 Special evaluation
(6) An agency shall do all of the following:
(a) Provide the foster parent with a copy of the
report required by subrule (5) of this rule within 10
calendar days of its completion.
One of one special investigation reviewed did not have documentation the foster
parent was provided a copy of the report within 10 calendar days of its completion
as required.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
• Technical assistance was not provided.
V. CONSULTTION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas:
• The agency was not in need of consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD

There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review.
Chief Administrator Assessment
The assessment reported no barriers in the agency meeting requirements during
this review period. The Chief Administrator(CA) reported the agency recently
began taking part in collaborative efforts to increase metrics along with WMPC.
The assessment reported regular review of metrics has been effective. The CA
expressed confidence the agency will continue to meet licensing requirements
over the next review period.
Financial Overview
Since this agency is part of MDHHS, financial records were not requested or
reviewed.
Staff and Youth Interviews
Interviews were conducted with two staff face-to-face at the agency. Staff reported
feeling supported by coworkers as well as supervision and did not express any
areas of concern.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency maintains sufficient office space, equipment and supplies to ensure
delivery of licensing and adoption services. All files were stored securely.
VII. FIELD ANALYST FINDINGS
There were no identified safety concerns.

VIII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is not in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. Upon receipt of an acceptable corrective action plan, it
is recommended that the agency will be issued a renewal of their regular license.
________6/22/2023_____________________________
Melinda Gubbins Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
June 23, 2023

Jessica VandenHeuvel Date
